meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure of my ability to succeed in my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Eric, a senior majoring in Physics and Astronomy. I’ve taken a lot of difficult and abstract courses lately, and I’m starting to feel like I’m falling behind. Some of the classes even overlap with my major, and I’m worried that I’m not doing enough to stay in the program. I’re also involved in a few student organizations, and I’m trying to balance them all while studying. I feel frustrated and uncertain about whether I’m even capable of doing what I’m doing in my major, and I’m not sure how to get help. I’m hoping to meet with a counselor or mentor who can help me plan out my coursework more effectively, or to discuss whether my approach is working or if I need to make any major changes.
